API Reference#

pocoMC consists mainly of the following parts:

The Sampler#

class pocomc.Sampler(nparticles, ndim, loglikelihood, logprior, bounds=None, threshold=0.75, scale=True, rescale=False, diagonal=True, loglikelihood_args=None, loglikelihood_kwargs=None, logprior_args=None, logprior_kwargs=None, vectorize_likelihood=False, vectorize_prior=False, pool=None, parallelize_prior=False, corr_threshold=None, flow_config=None, train_config=None)#

Main Precondioned Monte Carlo sampler class.

Parameters

  • nparticles (int) – The total number of particles/walkers to use.

  • ndim (int) – The total number of parameters/dimensions.

  • loglikelihood (callable) – Function returning the log likelihood of a set of parameters.

  • logprior (callable) – Function returning the log prior of a set of parameters.

  • bounds (np.ndarray or None) – Array of shape (ndim, 2) holding the boundaries of parameters (default is bounds=None). If a parameter is unbounded from below, above or both please provide None for the respective boundary.

add_samples(N=1000, retrain=False, progress=True)#

Method that generates additional samples at the end of the run

Parameters

  • N (int) – The number of additional samples (default is N=1000).

  • retrain (bool) – Whether or not to retrain the normalising flow preconditioner between iterations (default is retrain=False).

  • progress (bool) – Whether or not to print progress bar (default is progress=True).

run(x0, ess=0.95, nmin=5, nmax=1000, progress=True)#

Method that runs Preconditioned Monte Carlo.

Parameters

  • x0 (np.ndarray) – Array holding the initial positions of the particles. The initial positions must be sampled from the prior distribution.

  • ess (float) – The effective sample size maintained during the run (default is ess=0.95).

  • nmin (int) – The minimum number of MCMC steps per iteration (default is nmin=5).

  • nmax (int) – The maximum number of MCMC steps per iteration (default is nmin=1000).

  • progress (bool) – Whether or not to print progress bar (default is progress=True).
